attributes.description:
KIA DEALER OF THE YEAR - 2022
We the Kia Konfidence Edenvale team pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our esteemed clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125-workshop inspection check as well as DEKRA roadworthy and condition report before being displayed on our showroom floor. All vehicles delivered have a full-service history and are accident free. We infuse ourselves with EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. At Kia Edenvale we will also tailor make a DEAL that will not only suit your needs but your budget as well. We also offer finance options with all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal possible. CALL US NOW and one of our experienced Kia Konfidence Sales Executives will gladly assist you in making your Vehicle dreams come TRUE.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 2 810.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 16 000.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.

attributes.description: At Kia Konfidence Hatfield we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre Owned vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Condition report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you for a test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome.

attributes.description: The Sorento SUV has been a proud flagbearer for Kias design and quality credentials since the 1st-generation model debuted in 2002 It has not only won red dot and iF Design Awards, but is also a consistent segment leader in the annual JD Power Initial Quality Study. Car Magazine first choice for luxury SUV. This 7 seater is big enough for 7 adults. The sleek and agile Sorento brings luxury, technology and practicality to the street with ideally balanced proportions. Advanced handling dynamics, forward-thinking safety features, and truly empowering connectivity come together in a sophisticated package that helps you navigate the demands of modern life in style. With more than 145kw and almost 490 nm, this is a very powerful vehicle and extremely light on fuel. The Sorento interior offers a high standard of comfort and luxury featuring finely crafted seats.
